summary: MY 2002 ENVOY HAS A PROBLEM WITH THE DOORS ELECTRICAL SYSTEM. SOMETIMES WHEN I DRIVE OVER A BUMP IN THE ROAD ALL 4 OF THE DOORS WILL UNLOCK. THIS PROBLEM SEEMS TO OCCUR MORE OFTEN DURING COLDER WEATHER. THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN IN SERVICE 4 TIMES FOR THIS SAME PROBLEM, THEY TELL ME THAT THEY ARE UNABLE TO DUPLICATE IT.   *NLM
